entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 10.0 API Reviews #35722
  • EF9 Migration Performance Regression #35716
  • M.D.Sqlite: More robust cross-platform extension loading #35715

Closed

  • Cannot roundtrip TimeSpan.MinValue #35714

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Process Coalesce-simplified Convert node properly in funcletizer #35721
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35720
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35719
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35718
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0-staging] Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35717
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35617
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Add function mapping for Ticks to sqlserver #35465
    community-contribution
